src_original: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dātā bhavati dānapatiḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakāyācanakebhyaḥ,  annam annārthikebhyaḥ pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo yānaṃ yānārthikebhyo vastraṃ vastrārthikebhyaḥ  puṣpaṃ puṣpārthikebhyo mālyaṃ mālyārthikebhyo gandhaṃ gandhārthikebhyo vilepanaṃ  vilepanārthikebhya upāśrayam upāśrayārthikebhya śayyāsanaṃ śayyāsanārthikebhya upakaraṇam  upakaraṇārthikebhyo bhaiṣajyaṃ bhaiṣajyārthikebhyaḥ,

src_original: yāvad anyatarānyatarā mānuṣyakāpariṣkārān dadāti putrārthikebhyaḥ putraṃ dadāti duhitṛkārthikebhyo duhitṛn dadāti bhāryārthikebhyo bhāryāṃ dadāti rājyārthikebhyo rājyaṃ dadāti,

tgt_original: 」須菩提說是般若波羅蜜品時，三千大千世界六種振動：

tgt_original: 東湧西沒、西湧東沒，南湧北沒、北湧南沒，中湧邊沒、邊湧中沒。

src_original: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahābrahmāṇas te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā  yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ābhāsvarā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā  yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śubhakṛtsnā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,  yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau bṛhatphalā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā  yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,  yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau yaś ca teṣāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,  yaś ca teṣāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,  yaś ca teṣāṃ yāmānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
tgt_original: 三千大千世界諸釋提桓因等諸忉利天、須夜魔天王等諸夜魔天、刪兜率陀天王等諸兜率陀天、須涅蜜陀天王等諸妙化天，婆舍跋提天王等諸自在行天，各與無數百千億諸天，俱來在會中。

src_original: yaś ca teṣāṃ śuddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,  sa tathāgatasya prakṛtyavabhāsasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,  sahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,  śatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,  koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,  saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate,
tgt_original: 是諸四天王天乃至首陀婆諸天業報生身光明，於佛常光，百分、千分、萬億分不能及一，乃至不可以算數譬喻為比。

src_original: tathāgatasya prakṛtyā ābhāyāḥ purataḥ sarvās tā devānāṃ karmavipākajā ābhā na bhāsante na tapanti na virocante,  tathāgatasyaiṣābhā sāgrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate viśiṣṭākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāte praṇītākhyāyate anuttarākhyāyate niruttarākhyāyate.
tgt_original: 世尊光明最勝、最妙、最上第一，諸天業報光明在佛常光邊不照不現，譬如焦炷比閻浮檀金。

src_original: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:

src_original: ete bhadanta subhūte yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā  devāḥ trayastriṃśā devā yāmā devā tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino  devā brahmakāyikā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhatphalā devāḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā  devās te sarve saṃnipatitā bhadanta subhūte dharmaśravaṇāya prajñāpāramitopadeśaṃ śrotukāmāḥ.
tgt_original: 「是三千大千世界諸四天王天乃至首陀婆諸天，一切和合欲聽須菩提說般若波羅蜜義。

src_original: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?  katamā ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā?

tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩應薩婆若心，修四念處，以無所得故； 乃至修佛十力、十八不共法，以無所得故。

src_original: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair daśatathāgatabalāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩應薩婆若心，行檀波羅蜜，以無所得故；

tgt_original: 「復次，憍尸迦！ 菩薩摩訶薩行般若波羅蜜時，作是觀：

src_original: dharmā evaite dharmān abhiṣyandayanti pariṣyandayanti paripūrayanti parispharayanti parimīmāṃsyante,  nāsty atrātmā vā ātmīyaṃ va. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 『但諸法諸法共相因緣，潤益增長，分別校計，是中無我、無我所。

src_original: tathā hi yad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad bodhicitte na samavahitaṃ,  yad bodhicittaṃ tat pariṇāmanācitte na samavahitaṃ,
tgt_original: 』菩薩迴向心不在阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心中，阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心不在迴向心中；

src_original: yat kauśika pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad bodhicitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  yad bodhicittaṃ tat pariṇāmanācitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. iyaṃ kausika bodhisattvasya
tgt_original: 迴向心於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心中不可得，阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心於迴向心中亦不可得。

src_original: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yad evaṃ sarvadharmāś ca pratyavekṣate na kvacid dharmeṣu paricarati.
tgt_original: 菩薩雖觀一切法，亦無法可得，是名菩薩摩訶薩般若波羅蜜。

src_original: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamāyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  dvitīyāyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩，須陀洹果無為相、斯陀含果無為相、阿那含果無為相、阿羅漢果無為相不應住，辟支佛道無為相、佛道無為相不應住。

src_original: tṛtīyāyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  caturthāyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 須陀洹福田不應住，斯陀含、阿那含、阿羅漢、辟支佛、佛福田不應住。

src_original: navamyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  daśamyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩初地中不應住，以有所得故； 乃至第十地中不應住，以有所得故。

src_original: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpāde sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 「復次，菩薩摩訶薩住初發心中，我當具足檀波羅蜜不應住，乃至我當具足般若波羅蜜不應住；

src_original: kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.  smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  samyakprahāṇāni paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  ṛddhipādāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  indriyāṇi paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 具足六波羅蜜當入菩薩位，不應住；

src_original: balāni paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  bodhyaṅgāni paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhabhūmau sthāsyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.  (ŚsP II-2 179)
tgt_original: 入菩薩位已，當住阿鞞跋致地，不應住；

src_original: pañcabodhisattvābhijñāḥ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 菩薩當具足五神通，不應住，以有所得故。

src_original: pañcasu bodhisattvābhijñāsu sthitvā aprameyāny asaṃkhyeyāni buddhakṣetrāṇy upasaṃkramiṣyāmi  buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya śrutvā ca
tgt_original: 菩薩住五神通已，我當遊無量阿僧祇佛界，禮敬、供養諸佛，聽法；

src_original: tathatvāya parebhyo deśayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 聽法已，為他人說；

src_original: yādṛśāni ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāni tadṛśāni eva pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩如是不應住，以有所得故。 如諸佛世界嚴淨，我亦當莊嚴世界，不應住，以有所得故。

src_original: sattvān bodhau paripācayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 成就眾生令入佛道，不應住；

src_original: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃś ca lokadhātuṃ gatvā tān tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkariṣyāmīti gurukariṣyāmīti mānayiṣyāmīti pūjayiṣyāmīti,  puṣpamālyagandhavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ koṭīniyutaśatasahasraiś ca tāṃs tathāgatāṃ pūjayiṣyāmīty evam api na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 到無量阿僧祇世界諸佛所，尊重、愛敬、供養，以香華、瓔珞、澤香、搗香、幢幡、華蓋、百千億種寶衣供養諸佛，不應住，以有所得故。

src_original: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 我當令無量阿僧祇眾生發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，如是菩薩不應住；

src_original: pañcacakṣuṣy utpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. katamāni pañca?  māṃsacakṣur divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur utpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  sarvasamādhīṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  yena yena punaḥ samādhīn ākāṅkṣayiṣyāmi vikrīḍituṃ tena tena samādhinā vikrīḍiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogema,
tgt_original: 我當生五眼： 肉眼、天眼、慧眼、法眼、佛眼，不應住； 我當生一切三昧門，不應住； 隨所欲遊戲諸三昧，不應住；

src_original: sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 我當生一切陀羅尼門，不應住；

src_original: daśatathāgatabalāni pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 我當得佛十力，不應住；

src_original: catvāri vaiśāradyāni pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 我當得四無所畏、四無礙智、十八不共法，不應住；

src_original: mahāmaitrīṃ pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  mahākaruṇāṃ pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti evam api bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 我當具足大慈大悲，不應住；

src_original: dvātriṃśatāni mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam (ŚsP II-2 180)
tgt_original: 我當具足三十二相，不應住；

src_original: aśīty anuvyañjanāni kāye pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.  śuddhānusārīni na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 我當具足八十隨形好，不應住，以有所得故。

src_original: dharmānusārīni na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  aṣṭamaka iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 「是八人——是信行人、是法行人，如是不應住；

src_original: srotaāpanna iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  saptakṛtvabhavaparamam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  kulaṃkula ity ekavīcika iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  samaśīrṣapudgala iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 須陀洹極七世生不應住，家家不應住；

src_original: āyuḥkṣaye kleśakṣaye ceti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 須陀洹命終垢盡不應住；

src_original: avinipātadharmā iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  sakṛdāgāmi sakṛd imaṃ lokam āgamya duḥkhasyāṃ taṃ kariṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 須陀洹中間入涅槃不應住； 是人向斯陀含果證不應住； 是人斯陀含，一往來入涅槃不應住；

src_original: anāgagāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratikannaka iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 是人向阿那含果證不應住；

src_original: anāgāmi tatraiva nirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 斯陀含一種不應住；

src_original: arhatphalasākṣātkriyāyaiḥ pratipannaka iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 是人阿那含，彼間入涅槃，不應住； 是人向阿羅漢果證不應住；

src_original: arhann ihaivānupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayiṣyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 是人阿羅漢今世入無餘涅槃不應住；

src_original: pratyekabuddha iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 是辟支佛不應住；

src_original: mārgākārajñatājñāne sarvākārajñatāyāṃ ca na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmān abhisaṃbuddhā sarvāvāsanā na saṃvikte śakṣayāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakrapravartayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  buddhakārye kṛtvā aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti,  evam api na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 過聲聞、辟支佛地，我當住菩薩地，不應住； 道種智中不應住，以有所得故。 一切種、一切法知已，斷諸煩惱及習，不應住； 佛得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，當轉法輪，不應住； 作佛事，度無量阿僧祇眾生入涅槃，不應住。

src_original: aparimitaś ca me āyur bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 「四如意足中不應住； 入是三昧，住如恒河沙等劫壽，不應住； 我當得壽命無殃數劫，不應住；

src_original: dvātriṃśatāṃ me mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānām ekaikalakṣaṇaṃ śatapuṇyapariniṣpannaṃ bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 三十二相，一一相百福莊嚴，不應住；

src_original: yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ pūrveṇa,  yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavo dakṣiṇena,  yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paścimena,  yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātava uttareṇa,  yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ uttarapūrveṇa,  yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā (ŚsP II-2 181)  lokadhātavaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇena,  yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavo dakṣiṇapaścimena,  yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paścimottareṇa,  tāvanta ekaṃ me buddhakṣetraṃ bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 我一世界如十方恒河沙等世界，不應住；

src_original: vajropamo me trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 我三千大千世界純是金剛，不應住；

src_original: bodhivṛkṣāś ca me tādṛśo gandho niścaret,  ye sattvās taṃ gandham ājighreyus teṣām na rāgadveṣamohāś ca vyābādheyur iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittam utpadyeyur iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 使我菩提樹當出如是香，眾生聞者，無有婬欲、瞋恚、愚癡，亦無聲聞、辟支佛心，是一切人必當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提；

src_original: sarve ca te niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyā samyaksaṃbuddhāv iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  ye ca sattvās taṃ bodhivṛkṣagandham ājighreyus teṣāṃ na kaścid vyādhir bhaved kāye vā citte veti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.  tatra ca me buddhakṣetre na rūpaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 若眾生聞是香者，身病、意病皆悉除盡，不應住。

src_original: na vedanāśabdo bhaven na saṃjñāśabdo bhaven na saṃskāraśabdo bhaven na vijñānaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  na dhātuśabdo nāyatanaśabdo na pratītyasamutpādaśabdo bhaved iti sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  na dānapāramitāśabdo bhaven na śīlapāramitāśabdo bhaven na kṣāntipāramitāśabdo bhaven  na vīryapāramitāśabdo bhaven na dhyānapāramitāśabdo bhaven na prajñāpāramitāśabdo  bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  nādhyātmaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na bahirdhāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  na śūnyatāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na mahāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na paramārthaśūnyatāśabdo  nātyantaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānavarāgraśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānavakāraśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na prakṛtiśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 「當使我世界中無有色、受、想、行、識名字，不應住；

src_original: na sarvadharmaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānupalambhaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  nābhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na svabhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena, (ŚsP II-2 182)  na smṛtyupasthānaśabdo bhaven na samyakprahāṇaśabdo bhaven na ṛddhipādaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  nendriyaśabdo bhaven na balaśabdo bhaven na bodhyaṅgaśabdo bhaven nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaśabdo bhaven nāryasatyaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavaym upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 當使我世界中無有檀波羅蜜名字乃至無有般若波羅蜜名字，當使我世界中無有四念處名字乃至無有十八不共法名字，亦無須陀洹名字乃至無有佛名字，不應住，以有所得故。

src_original: tathā hi tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvadharmā nopalabdhāḥ.
tgt_original: 諸佛得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，一切諸法無所得故。

src_original: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 如是，憍尸迦！ 菩薩於般若波羅蜜中不應住，以無所得故。

src_original: athāyuṣmataḥ śāradvatīputasyaitad abhūt:
tgt_original: 」爾時，舍利弗心念：

src_original: kathaṃ punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?
tgt_original: 「菩薩今云何應住般若波羅蜜中？

src_original: atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāñcid devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
tgt_original: 【經】爾時，會中有諸天子作是念：

src_original: yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni vijñāyante,  tāni mantrayamāṇāni,
tgt_original: 「諸夜叉言語字句所說，尚可了知；

src_original: idaṃ punar api na vijñāyate yad āryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayati vibhajaty uttānīkaroti upadiśati.
tgt_original: 須菩提所說言語、論義解釋般若波羅蜜，了不可知！

src_original: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān āmantrayate sma,
tgt_original: 」須菩提知諸天子心所念，語諸天子：

src_original: na vijñāyate devaputrāṇām āmantrayate.
tgt_original: 「不解不知耶？

src_original: devaputrā āhuḥ:
tgt_original: 」諸天子言：

src_original: na vijñāyate āryasubhūte.
tgt_original: 「大德！ 不解不知。

src_original: subhūtir āha:
tgt_original: 」須菩提語諸天子：

src_original: tathā hi devaputrā ekākṣaram api na pravyāhrite tan na śruyate yan na śruyate tan na vijñāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 「汝等法應不知！ 我無所論說，乃至不說一字，亦無聽者。

src_original: na hy akṣarāṇi prajñāpāramitā na cātra kaścid deśayitā na śrotā na vijñātā. tat kasya hetoḥ?  anakṣarā hi devaputrās tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ tad yathāpi
tgt_original: 何以故？ 諸字非般若波羅蜜，般若波羅蜜中無聽者，諸佛阿耨多羅三藐三菩提無字無說。

src_original: nāma devaputrās tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho buddhanirmitaṃ nirmimīte. sa ca punar  nirmitaś catasraparṣado nirmimītaḥ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ.  atha sa nirmitaḥ tābhyo nirmitābhyaś catasṛbhyaḥ parṣadbhyo dharmaṃ deśayet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
tgt_original: 諸天子！ 如佛化作化人，是化人復化作四部眾——比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，化人於四部眾中說法。 於汝意云何？

src_original: devaputrāḥ. api tu tatra parṣadi kenacid deśitaṃ bhavet?  kenacic chrutam ājñātaṃ ca bhavet?
tgt_original: 是中有說者、有聽者、有知者不？

src_original: āhuḥ: no hīdaṃ bhadanta subhūte.
tgt_original: 」諸天子言： 大德！

src_original: subhūtir āha:
tgt_original: 」須菩提言：

src_original: evam eva devaputrāḥ sarvadharmā nirmitopamās tatra kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ,
tgt_original: 「一切法皆如化，此中無說者、無聽者、無知者。

src_original: tad yathāpi nāma devaputrāḥ svapnāntaragataḥ puruṣas tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhadharmaṃ deśayantaṃ paśyet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
tgt_original: 諸天子！ 譬如人夢中見佛說法。 於汝意云何？

src_original: devaputrāḥ. api nu tatra deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā ājñātaṃ vā bhavet.
tgt_original: 是中有說者、有聽者、有知者不？ 」諸天子言：

src_original: āhuḥ: no hīdaṃ bhadanta subhūte.
tgt_original: 「不也！ 大德！

src_original: subhūtir āha:
tgt_original: 」須菩提語諸天子：

src_original: evam eva devaputrāḥ svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmās tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacid
tgt_original: 「一切法皆如夢，無說、無聽、無知者。

src_original: śrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ tad yathāpi nāma devaputrāḥ dvau puruṣau parvatakandare  sthitvā buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ dharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ saṃghasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ,
tgt_original: 諸天子！ 譬如二人在大深澗，各住一面，讚佛法眾，有二嚮出。

src_original: devaputrāḥ. api nu tenaikena pratiśrutkāśabdena dvitīyapratiśrutkāśabdo vijñāpito bhavet.
tgt_original: 是二人嚮展轉相解不？ 」諸天子言：

src_original: āhuh: no hīdaṃ bhadanta subhūte.
tgt_original: 「不也！ 大德！

src_original: subhūtir āha:  evam eva devaputrāḥ sarvadharmāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ,
tgt_original: 」須菩提語諸天子：

src_original: tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ,
tgt_original: 「一切法亦如是，無說、無聽、無知者。

src_original: tad yathāpi nāma devaputrā dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe tathāgatam  arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham abhinirmimīte. catasraś ca parṣado 'binirmimīto bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāśikāḥ
tgt_original: 諸天子！ 譬如工幻師，於四衢道中，化作佛及四部眾，於中說法。

src_original: sa ca nirmitas tābhyo nirmitābhyaḥ parṣadbhyo dharmaṃ deśayet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?  devaputrāḥ,
tgt_original: 於諸天子意云何？

src_original: api nu tatra kenacid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā ājñātaṃ vā bhavet.
tgt_original: 是中有說者、有聽者、有知者不？

src_original: āhuh: no hīdaṃ bhadanta subhūte.
tgt_original: 」諸天子言： 「不也！ 大德！

src_original: subhūtir āha:
tgt_original: 」須菩提語諸天子：

src_original: evam eva devaputrā māyopamāḥ sarvadharmās tatra na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacid ājñātam.
tgt_original: 「一切諸法如幻，無說者、無聽者、無知者。

src_original: atha teṣām devaputrāṇām etad abhūt:
tgt_original: 」爾時，諸天子心念：

src_original: uttarīkariṣyati batāyam āryasthaviraḥ subhūtir uttānīkariṣyati batāyam āryasthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitām iti,  atha ca punar gambhīrād gambhīrataraṃ deśayati,  śūkṣmāt śūkṣmataraṃ praviśati.
tgt_original: 「須菩提所說，欲令易解，轉深轉妙！

src_original: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣām devaputrāṇām cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān etad avocat:
tgt_original: 」須菩提知諸天子心所念，語諸天子言：

src_original: na vaiśāradyāni prajñapitāni,  na pratisaṃvidaḥ prajñapitāḥ,  na mahāmaitrī prajñapitā,  na mahākaruṇā prajñapitā,  nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prajñapitāḥ.
tgt_original: 不說四念處乃至十八不共法；

src_original: na pratyekabuddhaḥ prajñapito na pratyekabodhiḥ prajñapitā,  na bodhisattvaḥ prajñapito na bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ prajñapitāḥ,  na buddhaḥ prajñapito na bodhiḥ prajñapitā,  nākṣarāṇi prajñapitāni.
tgt_original: 不說須陀洹果乃至阿羅漢果，不說辟支佛道，不說阿耨多羅三藐三菩提道——是法中不說名字語言。

src_original: athāyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
tgt_original: 」須菩提知諸天子心所念，語諸天子言：

src_original: evam etad devaputrā evam etad iti tad anabhilāpyā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddānāṃ bodhiḥ,  apravyāhārā sā na kenacid chrutā na vijñātā.
tgt_original: 「如是！ 諸天子！ 是法中，諸佛得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提不可說相，是中亦無說者、無聽者、無知者。

src_original: tena hi devaputrā ye srotaāpattiphale sthātukāmāḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
tgt_original: 以是故，諸天子！
